name: modern-punch
description: Modern punch dashboard prototype (NestJS + Next.js + Prisma)

scripts.dev: node ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -n api,web -c cyan,green "npm run dev --workspace @modern-punch/api" "npm run dev --workspace @modern-punch/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @modern-punch/core && npm run build --workspace @modern-punch/api && npm run build --workspace @modern-punch/web
